meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 milestone 1 released!
meta.summary: This is the first milestone of the upcoming Vert.x 4. It extends the 3.x callback asynchronous model to a future/callback hybrid model and introduces a Tracing API.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.1
meta.summary: This new version is a bug fix release that addresses issues reported in Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.1. We also updated Netty to version 4.1.39.Final to fix some CVEs.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.0 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce that Eclipse Vert.x 3.8.0 has been released. This is an important release introduceing a few changes ramping up to Vert.x 4.

meta.title: Things to keep in mind concerning CSRF attacks
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x like most frameworks provides an anti-CSRF defense. However, no framework can prevent all attack vectors that exist in the web. Therefore, developers need to be aware of some dangers and common attack vectors concerning CSRF defenses.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 milestone 2 released!
meta.summary: The new milestone release of Vert.x 4 includes progress on futurisation, tracing, and many other improvements.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4 CR1 released!
meta.summary: The first release candidate of the upcoming Vert.x 4 has just been released. We consider it feature complete and invite the community to test it.
